attributes.comment:
I want to express my distress in the proposed increase in fees for an international
adoption. The increases are outrageous. The families pursuing adoption are
already expected to invest so much financially not to mention emotionally. We
have already paid for the intial USCIS fee. We have also paid to renew our USCIS
fee due to an 18 month expiration period. We have also paid to be fingerprinted
twice, as required. As an American Citizen, I want to help other families to avoid
undue stress because of our own government regarding fees that seem
unncessary.
Sincerely,
Amy Docherty

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Amy Docherty
